read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/oecd_full_df.rds")) oecd_df <- oecd_full_df %>% select(country, flags, -ends_with("rank"), everything()) %>% mutate(iso2c = countrycode(iso3c, origin = ã„´ ë””ì§€í„¸ ì§€í‘œ ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ {.smaller} ![](img/public/oecd-dataset.png) - [ë””ì§€í„¸ ì •ë¶€ ìˆœìœ„](https://www.oecd-ilibrary.org/deliver/4de9f5bb-en.pdf?itemId=%2Fcontent%2Fpaper%2F4de9f5bb-en&mimeType=pdf) - [ì •ë¶€ ì¸ê³µì§€ëŠ¥ ì¤€ë¹„ì§€ìˆ˜](https://www.oxfordinsights.com/government-ai-readiness-index-2020) - [ë°ì´í„° ê²½ì œ ìˆœìœ„](https://hbr.org/2019/01/which-countries-are-leading-the-data-economy) - [ì‚°ì—…ìš© ë¡œë´‡ ë°€ë„](https://ifr.org/downloads/press2018/Robot_Density_by_country_WorldRobotics2020_graph.jpg) - [ì„¸ê³„ ê²½ìŸë ¥ ë³´ê³ ì„œ](https://reports.weforum.org/global-competitiveness-report-2019/competitiveness-rankings/) - [IMD ì„¸ê³„ ê²½ìŸë ¥ ì—°ê°](https://www.imd.org/wcc/world-competitiveness-center-rankings/world-digital-competitiveness-rankings-2020/) ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - ë””ì§€í„¸ ì •ë¶€ ìˆœìœ„ {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(reactable) library(htmltools) library(countrycode) oecd_full_df <- read_rds(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/oecd_full_df.rds")) oecd_df <- oecd_full_df %>% select(country, flags, -ends_with("rank"), everything()) %>% mutate(iso2c = countrycode(iso3c, origin = "iso3c", destination = "iso2c") %>% str_to_lower(.)) %>% mutate(gdp = round(gdp/10^9, 0), population = round(population / 10^6, 0)) oecd_df %>% arrange(gov_rank) %>% select(country, flags, ë””ì§€í„¸ì •ë¶€ = gov_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), ë””ì§€í„¸ì •ë¶€ = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - ë°ì´í„° ê²½ì œ {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(ai_rank) %>% select(country, flags, ë°ì´í„°ê²½ì œ = data_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), ë°ì´í„°ê²½ì œ = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - WEF ì„¸ê³„ ê²½ìŸë ¥ {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(wef_rank) %>% select(country, flags, WEF_ìˆœìœ„ = wef_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), WEF_ìˆœìœ„ = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - IMD ë””ì§€í„¸ ê²½ìŸë ¥ {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(digital_rank) %>% select(country, flags, IMD_ìˆœìœ„ = digital_rank, gdp, gdp_per_capita) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), gdp = colDef( width = 100, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), gdp_per_capita = colDef( format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ), IMD_ìˆœìœ„ = colDef( align = "center", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - ì¢…í•© {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} oecd_df %>% arrange(robot_rank) %>% select(country, flags, ì •ë¶€ = gov_rank, AI = ai_rank, ë°ì´í„°ê²½ì œ = data_rank, ë¡œë´‡ = robot_rank, WEF = wef_rank, IMD = digital_rank) %>% reactable( filterable = FALSE, searchable = FALSE, minRows = 10, highlight = TRUE, columns = list( country = colDef( width = 170, html = TRUE, cell = JS("function(cell) { return '' + cell.value + '' }") ), flags = colDef( width = 70 ), ì •ë¶€ = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), AI = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), ë¡œë´‡ = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), WEF = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), IMD = colDef( width = 70, align = "center" ), ë°ì´í„°ê²½ì œ = colDef( align = "center", width = 125, format = colFormat(separators = TRUE) ) ) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## ë””ì§€í„¸ ê°•ëŒ€êµ­ ì§€í‘œ - ì¢…í•© ì‹œê°í™” {.smaller} ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} library(plotly) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ë‹¤ìŒì˜ íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ë¥¼ ë¶€ì°©í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤: 'plotly' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': last_plot ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidymodels) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` â”€â”€ Attaching packages â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ tidymodels 1.0.0 â”€â”€ ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` âœ” broom 1.0.4 âœ” rsample 1.1.1 âœ” dials 1.1.0 âœ” tune 1.0.1 âœ” infer 1.0.4 âœ” workflows 1.1.3 âœ” modeldata 1.0.1 âœ” workflowsets 1.0.0 âœ” parsnip 1.0.4 âœ” yardstick 1.1.0 âœ” recipes 1.0.5 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` â”€â”€ Conflicts â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ tidymodels_conflicts() â”€â”€ âœ– scales::discard() masks purrr::discard() âœ– plotly::filter() masks dplyr::filter(), stats::filter() âœ– recipes::fixed() masks stringr::fixed() âœ– dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() âœ– yardstick::spec() masks readr::spec() âœ– recipes::step() masks stats::step() â€¢ Use tidymodels_prefer() to resolve common conflicts. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(embed) oecd_model_df <- oecd_df %>% select(-gov_rank, -robot_rank) recipe_spec <- oecd_model_df %>% na.omit() %>% select(country, gdp, population, gdp_per_capita, contains("rank")) %>% recipe( ~ .) %>% update_role(country, new_role = "id") %>% step_normalize(all_predictors()) %>% step_umap(all_numeric(), num_comp = 2, seed = c(777, 987)) umap_tbl <- recipe_spec %>% prep() %>% juice() # íˆ´íŒ ë°ì´í„° ì‘ì„± plot_tbl <- umap_tbl %>% inner_join( oecd_model_df %>% select(country, contains("rank")) ) %>% mutate(tooltip = str_glue( " Country: {country} WEF Rank: {wef_rank} IMD Rank: {digital_rank} AI Rank: {ai_rank} ë°ì´í„°ê²½ì œ Rank: {data_rank} " )) %>% mutate(club_3050 = ifelse(str_detect(country, "United States|Korea|Japan|United Kingdom|France|Germany|Italy"), "30-50 í´ëŸ½","ê¸°íƒ€") ) %>% mutate(club_3050 = factor(club_3050, levels = c("30-50 í´ëŸ½","ê¸°íƒ€"))) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Joining with `by = join_by(country)` ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} # mutate(class = case_when(str_detect(country, "United States") ~ "United States", # str_detect(country, "Korea") ~ "Korea", # str_detect(country, "Japan") ~ "Japan", # str_detect(country, "Germany") ~ "Germany", # TRUE ~ "ê¸°íƒ€")) %>% # mutate(class = factor(class, levels=c("Korea", "United States", "Japan", "Germany", "ê¸°íƒ€"))) # Plotly ì‹œê°í™” ---- plot_tbl %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% plot_ly(x = ~ umap1, y = ~ umap2, color = ~ club_3050, colors = c('red', 'darkgray'), hovertemplate = ~ tooltip) %>% add_markers(opacity = 1) %>% add_text(text = ~country, showlegend = FALSE, textposition = "top right") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
